description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 3/14/2006

As Nick and Ridge continue to engage in arguing, Brooke leaves to think things through.  Ridge follows Brooke and proposes to elope, but she rejects the offer and removes her wedding ring.  Stephanie is furious to hear Nick was with Taylor because that could have sent Brooke back to Ridge.  When Stephanie and Taylor later confront Nick, he shows no sign of worry… Brooke will be his, forever.
captions: form the beautiful 47 65 to 7 2006

we all make mistakes we were seconds

I just need some time to think this has

nothing happens when you left there was

no please let's talk about it now what

well I can't just do that

you don't need space Brooke you need me

it needs to feel right to me too we

you used Felicia's death to get me to

do you understand what happened tonight
she actually walked out on my son

Brook I needed you because I was ripped

how about Bridget and Nick they ended

he'd abandoned you the guy's a loser do

know I never should have left you for

promising to love each other I'm a

you said you forgave me I have then why
you know why when you left me for Taylor
it wasn't the end of my life even though

okay so Nick came and held your hand I

you don't believe that I could love

Brooke there are two people that know

that's you and me
I could spend eternity trying to

you've got that with Moroni I love you
rich
you know how much I loved you I would

again
you know we belong together Brooke
otherwise you would have never forgiven

our bags are packed the Moroney jet is

blow up with me tonight right now

well good for you

please can you just go you told me how

I'll go but I will be back

till I'm ready
